website_summaries.verdict: An exceedingly popular Mahjong set designed and styled for western players.
pros: Simple, no-nonsense fabric case for simple portability and storage
Case is padded for extra protection
cons: Game instructions can be hard to understand

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice set with everything included plus a nice padded carrying case. It comes with the standard set of 152 tiles plus 8 extra flowers plus 6 spare tiles (2 jokers and 4 blanks). The tiles appear to have good quality and have the same pictures we are used to playing with so that is a plus. The included directions are basic and have a few minor typos but are readable. The racks are not real sturdy but have a push extension but no pegs to hold chips which is not a big negative. Chips, bettor, spare tiles and dice are included and are found in the carrying case zipper compartment.
customer_reviews.author: sailor295

customer_reviews.title: Wrong number of tiles!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have one too many 6 stick and one less 5stick need a replacement tile!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I didn't open this until after the return period. Although the case and tiles are fine, the plastic tile racks do not fit a full Mah Jongg wall correctly. Also, the dice are laughable - misshapen cubes, dots sloppily put on by hand, and ridiculously tiny (barely over 1/4 x 1/4 inch). The game can still be played, but I'm really disappointed in the quality. Unusual for Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: OC Mom

customer_reviews.title: A good set for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It is a decent set for the price. The tiles are not particularly pretty but functional. I bought this set so I could dump all the tiles in the bag rather than having to put in a box. Easier, faster. The tiles are not exactly what is said in the description. There are not 10 jokers but 8. It's not an issue unless you lose one. There are no blank tiles either, so if you lose a tile you would have to buy additinal tiles. I have a set where I have not been able to find replacement tiles, so it could be an issue. But probably not an issue. It does have double the number of flowers and seasons.
customer_reviews.author: M. Green

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: This set is a good buy for the money. The tiles are plain, so not the prettiest set; but everything you need is here. My only complaint is that sometimes the pictures of the suits on the tiles is a little hard to decipher. After using the set for a short time, that was no longer a problem. I highly recommend this set if you are a beginner and, if after getting some experience, you want to get a pretty set - investing the money is not a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Linda F.

customer_reviews.title: Great Mah Jongg set and bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this set! I've been shopping for a Mah Jongg set for several months. I love the padded bag with the shoulder carry straps. Makes it so easy to carry the game and leaving your hands free of all that other stuff. Plus, being a soft bag it is so much easier to repack than the hard sided carry bags. Tiles are beautifully white and the racks are exactly as pictured. The padded wrap-around keeps the racks for banging together and getting cracked. Very good purchase. A friend loved mine so much she bought her own.
customer_reviews.author: Dyan L.

customer_reviews.title: Complete Man Jong set ready to play
customer_reviews.text: For the price paid I am very happy with the quality of this set. The tiles are a nice weight and are easy to read with clear images. The racks have pusher bars which helps with moving walls during play. The instruction book is better than many. It has the basics and even includes some examples of hands for practicing if you don't yet have your own card. The carrying case is good quality and fits the set nicely. It does have a handle large enough for over a shoulder if desired. One negative is the fabric lining of the case makes a loud crinkling sound when moved. I recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: Thrivin53

customer_reviews.title: Should Have Been Complete
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this item I didn't play American Mah Jongg and didn't need jokers. Now we're trying to learn it and find that instead of receiving 8 jokers we got two tiles that say "Joker" and only four that are blank. We can not play American Mah Jongg without 8 jokers. Could the company please send me at least 6 jokers to match this set?
customer_reviews.author: Peggy A Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Purchased used set advertised as new.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Carry Bag seems sturdy, items were wrapped well on delivery, tiles are clearly marked. Cons: On my other set a plastic cover came with the tile boxes to prevent them from possibly falling out - none with this set. Same cons as others about the small dice etc. Most important-I believe this set was used and I was not aware at purchase-the tiles are clean but clearly dull and scratched on backs.
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.title: Great colorful portable handy Mahjong Game!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Mahjong set -- it is very compact and has all the parts. Mine came without the dice but that was not a problem; I was able to find the dice at a Dollar Tree and really like the appearance of the tiles. I have not yet played a lot with this set but I have checked the parts and done a layout with other players since we are just learning the game. I look forward to many games with this set. I like the fact that it came in a nice satchel carry-all, and is portable to take wherever I need to take it for a lot of fun! Would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Deltenney

customer_reviews.title: American Mah Jongg Set
customer_reviews.text: This American Mah Jongg Set has everything a beginner would need to start playing Mah Jongg. All the tiles with jokers, a bag case with four racks and pushers, and dice. It's a wonderful gift.
customer_reviews.author: Unhappy

customer_reviews.title: New 166 Tile Full Size American Mahjongg Set Soft Burgundy Bag Case & 4 color pushers
customer_reviews.text: The New 166 Tile Full Size American Mahjongg Set Soft Burgundy Bag Case & 4 colored racks each with an attached pusher arrived in two days from order. The bag and pusher covers are well made and padded; they should serve to protect the racks from breakage and last for years. The tiles have strong colors and are of a good quality. The dice are tiny but serviceable. The money chips are very, very thin--they would fly away on the wind if playing outdoors...play with painted pennies instead. This was an excellent buy at the time I ordered, the price went up the next week and it is sold by a different vendor.
customer_reviews.author: wreneel

customer_reviews.title: Big problem
customer_reviews.text: The set arrived ALL WRONG! No flowers, green or white dragons, twice as many red dragons, and twice as many cracks. CRAZY!! Am waiting to hear from them. Soooo disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie F.

customer_reviews.title: Great Set
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice value....nice padded case....the racks are not of the higest quality but they are adequate. The tiles are perfect and I would buy this set again.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Virelli

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: What a great set! And the price can't be beat. The bag and the "wrap around" covers for the tiles and the racks are all neoprene. Very well made and lightweight. I just learned how to play and joined a Mah Jongg club - we play with older sets that are in wooden cases, and they are heavy! I just sling this set over my shoulder and off I go!
customer_reviews.author: leisfam

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need to play mah jongg!
customer_reviews.text: This set is complete with tiles, dice, racks, pushers, carrying case, betting discs, and even a little booklet about how to play mah jongg. Everything is of good quality and should allow you to have fun playing mah jongg with your friends for MANY years! :-)
customer_reviews.author: C. Tolar

customer_reviews.title: Priced well
customer_reviews.text: great set & includes the "pushers"...I'm fairly new to the game...it's perfect for me! I like the soft case... I don't know why anyone would need to spend lots of money on a set...this one is just fine...for a really good price.

customer_reviews.title: Great Price for Very Satisfactory Set
customer_reviews.text: Have used now for a year. Easy to take house to house. Sturdy set and racks. Great price. It is not an elegant set but totally functional. I believe our group plays by typical American Rules. The Booklet is not totally correct, hence I suggest you go to a MJ site for correct information on play. You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: Prescott, AZ

customer_reviews.title: Value at its best!
customer_reviews.text: What a deal! The case is not as nice as some of the quilted ones but for less than half the price who cares! Set came well packaged, complete and perfect !
customer_reviews.author: Sarah J.

customer_reviews.title: Tiles are Smaller than I would like
customer_reviews.text: The pieces are nice but smaller than what I am used to. It is nice that there are translations for Westerners. The pushers are good and the bag is convenient.
customer_reviews.author: lan811

customer_reviews.title: which I do not like. The case is also a cheap material
customer_reviews.text: I ordered burgundy, and the case is more of a fuchsia color, which I do not like. The case is also a cheap material. Unfortunately, I opened it after the return date. The tiles seem to be fine, just very disappointed in the case and color.
customer_reviews.author: dennis scannell

customer_reviews.title: Great Set!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a spare set to leave in the car as I play all over. My original set is beautiful, but very old and heavy. I saw this set and had Amazon points to use, so this was quite inexpensive. I am very happy with this set; use it at least once weekly; easy to carry. The tiles are very clear and easy to read. Yes the dice are small; for 75 cents I replaced mine. I would recommend this set without reservation. It's a deal!
customer_reviews.author: Fern J. Grunberger

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PURCHASE - WHAT A DEAL!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to open the box which came to my door so quickly! It almost felt like Christmas! After reviewing everything, I couldn't believe the quality of this maj-jonggset for the price. The pushers and tiles are packed so nicely and fit perfectly in the deep red carrying case. The pushers are colorful and will work great. The detailed clear maj-jong tiles are stored in two long black cardboard boxes. Once you get passionate about maj-jong, all you want to do is "keep playing."! Love my new set!!
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: The tiles are larger and the markings on the tiles are larger and clearer. I am very happy with this set. Also the dice are larger - not the tiny ones my friends have. The packaging is good for storage and all the necessary supplies are there with extras. A very nice set for Mah Jongg.
customer_reviews.author: Diane F.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful set for the money! I am a new player, but I've seen quite a few sets after playing with different groups. The tiles are substantial and very clearly marked. While the racks and pushers are OK, the bag is terrific: padded, with plenty of room for everything, padded covers for the tile boxes, and long handles for carrying as a shoulder bag.
customer_reviews.author: D. Christman

customer_reviews.title: Okay set
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered two similar sets which had the standard tile faces. On this set the tile faces are a little different. In other words, bams, dots, dragons etc do not look the same as all other modern sets I have seen. They are not terribly different but are confusing for some new players. I also feel that the tiles are a bit lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Retired and Happy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Mahjong is addictive, but I'm beginning the journey. I didn't want to sink over $100 into a set, and so I was very pleased I found this one! The tiles are solid, but the stands are plastic, so care will need to go into those. The bag is of a good quality. This is a great set!
customer_reviews.author: Finley B

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Set
customer_reviews.text: My friends are envious. This is a very nice set - yes the dice are puny, but I ordered some when I placed this order so that worked out great. I really like the tote bag type carrier. My friends have the brief case looking case which just adds weight. This bag is sturdy and very easy to transport. Friends commented on how nice the tiles are. They are nicely decorated and the paint is not smudged or faded as I saw in comments about other sets offered. I am really pleased with this set - quality and price! Thanks Amazon, you are my go-to place!!!
customer_reviews.author: MINI in the South

customer_reviews.title: Count the tiles!  Number of tiles in each suit was not as described.
customer_reviews.text: I like the set but the number of tiles listed were incorrect. The description said 10 jokers but there are only 8. There was supposed to be only 8 flowers but there are 16. There are no blank tiles as listed in the description (there was supposed to be 4 blanks). The good thing is it has enough tiles to play the American version of Mahjongg so I'm not returning it. The tiles are nice and the racks are colorful although lightweight and cheaply made. But for $50 - it's not a bad price.
customer_reviews.author: lolli

customer_reviews.title: I got this and it is really nice, The tiles look just fine and the bag ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this and it is really nice, The tiles look just fine and the bag is handy to carry the set around. They arrived with the pushers broken, all 4 ends were crushed. I contacted the vendor and they immediately sent replacements. It was a positive experience, order from HDNEK with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: RJC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value for the Money
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful set with pushers. I would have preferred bags instead of boxes for the tiles to lighten the weight. That is easily remedied with Ziplock bags - light weight and easily replaced. The tiles are beautiful and easy to read. Extra Jokers, Flowers and blank tiles are provided as well. The dice are tiny but that too is cheap to remedy. The red bag is sturdy with a nice zipper. This is an excellent value for the money
customer_reviews.author: arkiebell

customer_reviews.title: White Tiles?????
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this set because it was on clearance and that the tiles were listed as ivory in color. The tiles were, in fact, white. The case was burgundy, as described. The plastic was torn around the tiles. There was no book of instructions. Was this a return? Not sure.
customer_reviews.author: C. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Different symbols than other Mahjong games.
customer_reviews.text: The case and the packing looked great. However, the tile symbols were unlike any other Mahjong game we have- about 8 sets. It was difficult to use as we were used to other symbols and design of the Kraks, Dots and Bams.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Lovely and complete American Mah Jongg set. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: I like that the tiles for white not cream-colored
customer_reviews.text: I like that the tiles for white not cream-colored. I was a little disappointed in the racks they did not have the same ends on them as the set I bought previously. They did not have the post where you can put the chips. I like the fact that the bag was padded. I hate packing up all the tiles in the long boxes, I prefer to put them in a soft bag and then I can dump them out easily.
customer_reviews.author: iva ernst

customer_reviews.title: Perfect modern mahjong set
customer_reviews.text: Bag is sturdy, attractive, convenient, easy to use. Tiles are perfect. Love the attached "pushers". Appreciate the extra tiles. Price is right. Received several requests for my source. Love my new mahjong set!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Right number of tiles but two wrong tiles
customer_reviews.text: I have just begun playing regularly with this set, and found that it contained six 8 crak, and only two 7 crak, no wonder it was hard to MahJongg. Otherwise I love the game, tiles are easy to read. If anyone knows how I can get the two correct toes please let me know.
customer_reviews.author: Kona Coffee Guy

customer_reviews.title: Portable Set
customer_reviews.text: I like the soft bag. Tile pictures between bam bird and flowers are not confusing as I have seen in some sets. Eight extra flowers and jokers might be helpful but I have no idea what the plastic circles are for so that must be a different type of mah jongg.
customer_reviews.author: teach

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The tiles are good quality and the designs inset into it, not printed. They are quite small though. The red and green dragons are not the traditional symbols; just pictures of weird red and green dragons that look like deformed shrimps. The carry bag is a good idea and works well. The pushers do not have pegs for the money chips. The money chips, bettor and dice are poor quality; cheap and nasty. The instructions that come with the game are excellent IF you speak fluent Chinglish and already know how to play. There are many mistakes. I will keep this set as a back up.
customer_reviews.author: Bryony Dudek

customer_reviews.title: Open bag, set up table, play Mah Jongg
customer_reviews.text: These are the classic white tiles with plastic rack and pushers, dice and bag. Provides all you need for National Mah Jongg League gameplay at an unbeatable price. Extra tiles included just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality.
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't buy this set again. The tiles are white, but the colors, especially in the bams and dots are not vivid. The green dragon is more black than green. It is very difficult to get the racks back in the case. The case should be a couple of inches longer.
customer_reviews.author: Milton Holzman

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: I found the contents and case to be sturdy enough. Can’t toss around but well contained in case
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed unless I can resolve missing tiles.
customer_reviews.text: I finally got to open my set. I am missing an East and a 1 Crack! Is there any way to get those tiles?
customer_reviews.author: Bulmers mom

customer_reviews.title: It's Passable.
customer_reviews.text: It's ok for the money. Racks are flimsy and tiles are smaller than standard. Should have spent more money for a better set but it will do for now !
customer_reviews.author: MHK

customer_reviews.title: Nice game
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice set for the investment. We played the day the package arrived. The manufacturer apparently listened to the reviews. All pieces were in the game bag, including extra tiles, money markers and nicely sized die.
customer_reviews.author: Lake Huron Lady

customer_reviews.title: Too Heavy for Travel
customer_reviews.text: I have a genuine ivory/bamboo MahJong set of my own and wanted this one for travel. It is a beautiful plastic set, but it is so heavy that it wasn't suited for carrying as a travel game, so that is why I chose not to keep it. The set is very nice, however, and if you don't have a genuine set at home, this one would do the job well and it has trays to hold your pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Norma Odiaga

customer_reviews.title: Game Night Ready
customer_reviews.text: Did what it needed to do. Heads up: the blocks are smaller than I thought but they work with the stands. Our family is happy and we love playing with the set
customer_reviews.author: Antonette

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set
customer_reviews.text: Set packaged well. Tiles are beautiful and all there. Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: sherrymac

customer_reviews.title: majong tiles and push racks
customer_reviews.text: tiles and carrying bag are fine, push racks broke easily and had to be replaced with higher quality ones at consideral expense.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry DeLisa

customer_reviews.title: Just learning how to play - it isn't easy but I think it will be fun
customer_reviews.text: Just learning how to play - it isn't easy but I think it will be fun. Nice set. I'd first bought a real cheap set from Target. It had all the pieces but that one had a hard instruction booklet to understand and a flimsy cardboard box. This one is sturdy and better produced.
customer_reviews.author: M. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic price. Tiles are quality. Pushers are same as i've seen in other sets. Neoprene bag is ok but for the price it works great.
customer_reviews.author: cocopo

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Expected
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected, with all the necessary components, and at the lowest price I could find for a new set.
customer_reviews.author: Madge Walls

customer_reviews.title: I recommend a solid box to hold the supplies
customer_reviews.text: I recommend a solid box to hold the supplies. One of the plastic holders broke from use of the soft bag. The convenience of the solf bag is less important than the safety of the hard case container. The supplies in the bag are wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: J B

customer_reviews.title: Great set, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom for Christmas, and she just loves it. She's been taking lessons at the Senior Center and didn't think she'd end up with a good set. She and her friends are impressed with how nice it is, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: natalie fairlane

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GAME SET
customer_reviews.text: I just started taking classes for Mahjong and searched for the right game set. I was very impressed with the set along with the quality of the game pieces. It includes EVERYTHNG you need along with the instruction book. I HIGHLY recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SuzieQ

customer_reviews.title: Got a PINK bag? I ordered burgundy
customer_reviews.text: The set feels cheap, and the carrying case came to me a bright pink. I did not get what was pictured, but it can still be used to play so I guess its fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Holmberg

customer_reviews.title: Great Maj Set!
customer_reviews.text: This set is great quality and is just as expected! I had some additional questions for the seller and they were responsive and went above and beyond helping me out to make sure I had a great experience.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M

customer_reviews.title: It was received in good shape.
customer_reviews.text: I only received 3 of #7 crack. There were 5 # 8 cracks. Maybe that is how the error was made. Can they possibly send me another # 7 crack?
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Great Mahj set.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Mah Jongg set. The tiles are very easy to see, the racks were in perfect condition, and the bag is a very durable bag that will last a long time. This set will be very easy to travel with, too.
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Dossey

customer_reviews.title: This set was a disaster. The tile colors are ...
customer_reviews.text: This set was a disaster. The tile colors are not the same. The tiles are different sizes and colors.I opened late it was a gift and I just opened it to use it and missed the return policy.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Silver

customer_reviews.title: great set and great service
customer_reviews.text: looked at many mah Jongg sets for my wife - well reviewed and comes with a built in pusher - her whole group now always want to play with her set! the numbers are clear and good quality and a great price - one tile had a small surface ding that made it easily recognizable - they replaced the tile immediately !! great set, great service.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Luger

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the savings
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend purchased this for me as a surprise. I am new to playing Mahjong and this is a great way to practice. It is well made, in perfect condition and comfortable for transporting. I play with seasoned players who have very expensive sets and I feel quite pleased with my new set. Great buy for the savings.
customer_reviews.author: Marguerite Sowersby

customer_reviews.title: This was a very good buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: This was a very good buy for the price. I am very happy with it. I play Mah Jongg every week and I am happy to have a set that is so neat.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Burke

customer_reviews.title: Great Mah Jongg set!
customer_reviews.text: Love this Mah Jongg set. A friend paid twice as much for her set and the only difference is the case and her racks are a little sturdier. The tiles are exactly the same. I’ve had quite a few people asking me where I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Mah Jongg Game
customer_reviews.text: This set is portable & practical. The racks w/ pushers are plastic & somewhat lightweight. You just need to treat them gently. The tiles are perfect & there are extras as replacements. There's even a basic How to Play booklet included.
customer_reviews.author: Bretonia

customer_reviews.title: Great Set!
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with the speed of delivery, as well as the set itself. I am a rookie to the game and had no idea there were differently constructed racks/pushers. After using both, I appreciate the all plastic, all in one piece rack/pusher. Over all, the quality seemed almost better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Carol S.

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I love the bag , has lots of room to store the tiles and the racks, etc. I guess I was hoping the plastic racks would feel a little heavier, like lucite, but they are light weight plastic, a little flimsy, yet functional, but I will probably eventually order the wood racks to go with the set. Still, the price would be good. The tiles are a little bit smaller than standard sets but nice tiles and perfectly fine. Overall, a good value for the beginner. most sets with wood racks would be $100. on up, so I'm pleased with my purchase. Shipping was quick and well packed.
customer_reviews.author: Lucia Blum

customer_reviews.title: Racks too long
customer_reviews.text: The racks are too long and there is approximately an inch left after tiles are placed at the rack. It also does not fit easily into the bag. Have tried to get in touch with someone to exchange but to no avail.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine J. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Not bad enough to return
customer_reviews.text: Just now removed everything from the bag. One of the push bars was chipped off on the end. Not bad enough to return. I am new at this game so I don't think it will be a problem. We may be able to superglue. Other that that, looks real nice.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Mah Jongg Set
customer_reviews.text: I'm learning to play the game and wanted my own set. I like the soft bag. My only complaint is that the dice are so small. In fact, when I used the game with the other players, they teased me about the tiny squares and said they needed a magnifying glass to see the results. I found another pair in an unused board game to use--no more teasing!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Cahall

customer_reviews.title: Good price - bag has some places that were not ...
customer_reviews.text: Good price - bag has some places that were not sewn completely but contents seem to be in good condition. I like the pusher being attached to rack and the covers on the tile trays.
customer_reviews.author: Hilda getu

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete
customer_reviews.text: Product was not complete, tiles were missing, which was not discovered until game time.
customer_reviews.author: Pebble Beach Condo Assn.

customer_reviews.title: Handles too short to carry on shoulder.
customer_reviews.text: I wish it had a strap so I could carry it on my shoulder or over my head.
customer_reviews.author: cecmiami

customer_reviews.title: I am so pleased with this set
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with this set. Really could not be happier. The tiles are beautiful...very high quality, correct standard size. The canvas bag is a plus. Well made, easy to carry, sturdy. There is a zipper compartment in the bag for your extra tiles or the dice. This is just a beautiful set and I have played with many different ones in the past few years.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia R.

customer_reviews.title: American Mah Jongg Case
customer_reviews.text: This is well made but I prefer the "briefcase" style that I have for my Chinese Mah Jongg set. Nothing wrong with this...just not my preference.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy L

customer_reviews.title: Great Set!
customer_reviews.text: Product was received as advertised - and is great! The dice were small, and were substituted with larger ones, we had on hand. The case and organization of all the pieces were well designed and the players love the set!
customer_reviews.author: nh_mensch

customer_reviews.title: And the velcro sleeves inside keep my components together much better than my friends cases do
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded expectations. And the velcro sleeves inside keep my components together much better than my friends cases do.
customer_reviews.author: A Clay

customer_reviews.title: My Mah Jongg Set Soft Burgundy Bag Case .
customer_reviews.text: The product is exactly what I ordered and I like it. It was delivered on time. I am very satisfied. The only suggestion I would make is that if something is delivered and one is not home, it would have been nice if the delivery person would have set it inside my garage door rather than leave the box on the front step. I had been gone all day.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Farrier

customer_reviews.title: Nice set at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I loved this set. Unfortunately someone stole it out of my vehicle while I was in Chicago last weekend. I like this set because of the style of pushers and the group I play with likes them better than the other style of pushers too. If you like to play Mahjong and want your own set, I'd go with this one. There are many places on the internet to learn the game but it's best to play with people to learn it. Jump in and give it a chance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with my Mahj Set
customer_reviews.text: This set is just what I was looking for, soft side case and set are lighter weight than the hard case sets and easy to carry. Tiles are engraved, painted and a nice size, my only complaint is the teeny tiny dice, it would be nice to have a little larger dice. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: J. Nels

customer_reviews.title: Met expectations
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice, very functional set. My complaints are minor: the dice are very small; the plastic rails could be heavier(they slide on table very easily); and i was missing a tile. Given the great price i paid, these issues are no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Andrus

customer_reviews.title: New Mah Jongg player
customer_reviews.text: It has everything I need to play Mah Jongg in a compact padded carrying case. The tiles are of a good weight and printed clearly. The set included " pushers", betting discs and bettor, but very small dice. I will replace them as others have commented. It even includes an instruction booklet and extra flower, joker, and blank tiles.
customer_reviews.author: acorn

customer_reviews.title: Everything but the die and discs are great. These items are small and cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Everything but the die and discs are great. These items are small and cheaply made. I had to buy other ones to use.
customer_reviews.author: Gapeach7678

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality paint on the tiles
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality paint on the tiles. Only played the game once and have notice the paint on the tiles is coming off Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: sandy

customer_reviews.title: I like the tiles
customer_reviews.text: I like the tiles. They are easy to see the characters. The game set had everything in it. We are very pleased with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mary W

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love Mah Jongg and this set is perfect. Tiles are easy to read, Case is great. Good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Kay Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was hoping for. The tiles are nicely stamped and easy to read. The neoprene bag is easy to pack and carry.
customer_reviews.author: Java Judy1

customer_reviews.title: Best buy.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to a friend and was greatly appreciated. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: M. F. Karsh

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased. Everything in one set
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. Everything in one set. Tiles are very nice quality, racks have pushers attached, light weight and easily transportable. All my friends now want this set too!
customer_reviews.author: Nana M.

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient in it's own bag
customer_reviews.text: The tiles are nice as is the bag. Def a great value. Deducted one star because the dice are minuscule. Otherwise it's a good set!
customer_reviews.author: Thatsawrap

customer_reviews.title: Easy to store the set and pieces are easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything a beginner could wish for. Easy to store the set and pieces are easy to read and handle.
customer_reviews.author: M. Harms

customer_reviews.title: New complete Anerican Mah Jongg set
customer_reviews.text: My set was exactly as I expected. I seen another just like it in my neighborhood. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Calandra

customer_reviews.title: I'm just learning.
customer_reviews.text: I'm just learning how to play the game of Mah Jongg, so I was looking to buy a set of my own. One of the people I played with had this great set and I asked where she got it. She told me on Amazon, so I ordered one for myself and I am very pleased with the set.
customer_reviews.author: Joann De

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice and Affordable
customer_reviews.text: Of course, I would have loved a hard box to go with this set but the ease of transportation just couldn't be beaten. Nice job folks!
customer_reviews.author: RevReikiND

customer_reviews.title: Nice set. As expected
customer_reviews.text: Nice set. As expected. Bags are cushioned nicely. Tile trays do not have covers though. Still a nice set for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Gigi Boogren

customer_reviews.title: Great tiles and case at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great tiles and case at a great price! It has extra flower tiles, which threw us off at first. I'm a newbie to the game, and needed my own set to practice with.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Mah Jongg Madness
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice Mah Jongg Set. The tiles are colorful enough and easy to read. This set included clear pastel colored racks, so convenient with attached pushers and the soft clothe bag style case is light weight. All in all I am very pleased. I've been using this set every week since it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: BBC

customer_reviews.title: This is simply beautiful to look at even if you don't play the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is simply beautiful to look at even if you don't play the game. My friends gave it rave reviews. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: M. M. Laperle

customer_reviews.title: It was in perfect condition when I received it
customer_reviews.text: It was in perfect condition when I received it. There were no dice with the set but other than that it was ready for use.
customer_reviews.author: Diamond Girl

customer_reviews.title: The set was damaged
customer_reviews.text: One of the tiles was broken so I super glued I it. Also one of the tile racks arm was broken so I super glued it too. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

product_meta.title: American Mah Jongg Soft Bag Case New 166 Tile Set with 4 Color Pushers, Burgundy(Discontinued by manufacturer)

Instructions Included.
